alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 4:47PM CDT until August 08 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 447 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Vernon, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Aurora... Mount Vernon... Hoberg... Chesapeake... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 42 and 56. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
